English: YOU ARE DOWNED, WAITING FOR TEAMMATE! (NOTE: '{0}' TO OPEN MAP)
Description: A text that appears on screen when the player is downed (0% health.) "Waiting for teammate" refers to the fact that only a teammate can help you up once you're downed. "{0}" will be replaced by the appropriate keyboard key/gamepad button, do not alter those characters.

French.Translation: VOUS ÊTES ABATTU, ATTENDEZ VOTRE COÉQUIPIER ! (NOTE : {0} POUR OUVRIR LA CARTE)

Italian.Translation: SEI A TERRA, ATTENDI UN COMPAGNO DI SQUADRA! (NOTA: '{0}' PER APRIRE LA MAPPA)

German.Translation: SIE WURDEN ABGESCHOSSEN, AUF TEAMMITGLIEDER WARTEN! (HINWEIS: „{0}“ zum KARTENÖFFNEN)

Spanish.Translation: ¡TE HAS QUEDADO SIN SALUD! ¡ESPERANDO POR UN COMPAÑERO! (AVISO: «{0}» PARA ABRIR EL MAPA)

Russian.Translation: ВЫ БЕЗ СОЗНАНИЯ. ЖДИТЕ НАПАРНИКА! ('{0}', ЧТОБЫ ОТКРЫТЬ КАРТУ)

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: VOCÊ JÁ ERA, AGUARDANDO ALIADO! (OBS.: '{0}' PARA ABRIR MAPA)

Polish.Translation: POWALONO CIĘ, OCZEKIWANIE NA CZŁONKA DRUŻYNY! (UWAGA: '{0}', ABY OTWORZYĆ MAPĘ)

Japanese.Translation: ダウンした！チームメイトを待て！(注: '{0}' でマップを開く)

Korean.Translation: 쓰러졌습니다. 팀원을 기다리고 있습니다! (참고: '{0}' - 맵 열기)

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 你被擊倒了，等待隊友！（注意：「{0}」開啟地圖）

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 你已倒下，正在等待队友！（注：'{0}'打开地图）

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.Downed_X_ToOpenMap
